dcterms:description: An industrial dataset consisting of queries and historical tickets, where a query has a subject and description, and a historical ticket has a subject, description, and solution. The dataset includes 949 historical tickets, with 421 labeled pairs indicating their relatedness score.
dcterms:title: Industrial Dataset for Ticketing System

dcterms:creator: Pankaj Gupta
Florian Buettner
Hinrich Sch√ºtze
dcterms:description: A neural autoregressive topic model that provides state-of-the-art performance for text document modeling, outperforming LDA and RSM in terms of log-likelihood and document retrieval.
dcterms:title: DocNADE

dcterms:creator: David M Blei
Andrew Y Ng
Michael I Jordan
dcterms:description: A generative statistical model that allows sets of observations to be explained by unobserved groups that explain why some parts of the data are similar.
dcterms:title: LDA (Latent Dirichlet Allocation)

dcterms:creator: Geoffrey E Hinton
Ruslan R Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: An undirected topic model that improves upon traditional topic models by using a replicated softmax approach.
dcterms:title: Replicated Softmax (RSM)

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Ilya Sutskever
Kai Chen
Greg S Corrado
Jeff Dean
dcterms:description: A model that learns distributed representations of words and phrases and their compositionality, widely used in various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: Word2Vec

dcterms:creator: Jonas Mueller
Aditya Thyagarajan
dcterms:description: A recurrent architecture designed for learning sentence similarity, particularly effective in tasks involving pairs of sentences.
dcterms:title: Siamese LSTM

dcterms:creator: Guillaume Lample
Miguel Ballesteros
Sandeep Subramanian
Kazuya Kawakami
Chris Dyer
dcterms:description: A neural architecture designed for named entity recognition, utilizing character-level and word-level embeddings.
dcterms:title: Char-BLSTM
